dcterms:description: The ARC Challenge is a commonsense reasoning dataset containing grade-school science questions designed to evaluate a model’s ability to use prior knowledge about the world.
dcterms:title: ARC Challenge

dcterms:description: The Snarks dataset aims at distinguishing between sarcastic and non-sarcastic sentences, providing a benchmark for evaluating language models' performance in sarcasm detection.
dcterms:title: Snarks
